comment: Lemma for ~ lbsext . Since ` A ` is a chain (actually, we only need it to be closed under binary union), the union ` T ` of the spans of each individual element of ` A ` is a subspace, and it contains all of ` U. A ` (except for our target vector ` x ` - we are trying to make ` x ` a linear combination of all the other vectors in some set from ` A ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
